post.body: Could this be another "motrined moments" and this time, for Pepsi?!
Too cold. Tell me about it! Snowy and cold here in Iowa too. No onions though - the one thing that I dislike eating :(
Not at all!!!
I misread it...thinking you want onions! what's up?
Hello there. Where abt in MN are you?
Thanks Rush. Will let'em know.
Hi Kelly :-) nice to see you here.
Thank you for all your tips! Will give it a try or two or a few. They must've learned it from me. I don't like onions..
Pineapple tarts sounds yummy... but you can't bring food. Darn.
:-) I recently "cleaned up" my facebook friend list. Totally understand where you're coming from.
Your SiL is from M'sia?
Thanks! She was supposedly telling him a secret -- the pix is from 1+ yrs ago. They're still in "i wanna tell you a secret!" phase.
You're just good at remembering numbers and relating them.
Nice to connect with you, too :-)
I'll have to ask my MiL where she got it from. She brought it all the way from Malaysia for me!
do you mean delirious? ;)
Don't like them much, huh.
Jessica is your sister? Hmm. I thought her brother's name is Mark. She went to WHS, right? 95?
Are you related to Jessica Van Fossen at all?
That's.... a disturbing visual. Stop! LOL.
Are there any left??? What kind?
LOL! I'm glad you liked it. I usually loath fwds, but this one was really funny.
Thanks for clarifying. I was a bit shocked when I read that I must buy a book to join.
:D We're storefront in the non-traditional sense 4 now. Browsing/placing orders is mostly still online. PickUps welcomed.
One has to buy a book to join that forum??!
bummer. Can't DM you a link.
I see. Very cool. :-) I guess one would be out of luck if they defollow someone.
Ah. I'm not uptodate w/ the politics and news lately except #CPSIA so I didn't get it. I see what you mean now. ;)
Sell it? Sell what?
(Hi Hubby!) and @Aronado both have sideway avatars. What are you guys trying to say? :-)
Congratulations!!! Getting a new job in the down market speaks volumes.
It's been long awaited. Logo FINALLY went up late last month but been in this space since July!
Deep breath in... breath out.. and, eat lots of ice cream and french fries and chocolate :D
Yummy.
I suppose i'm crazy then ;) Hair is just hair! Actually I was bald... in a long ago once upon a time sort of way.
Missy, you should be studying, not FB'ing.
LOL... sounds like me. I had to clean my room and desk, ate some food, get my drink ready before I could study.
You fickle you. Have you tried tweetdeck?
OH dear. That's gotta be embarrassing.
:D I think I would be completely happy w/o snow, ever. I didn't see snow until I was 12.
Really?!?! I would live in Arizona if Hubby agrees...
Cranking up the heat. I dislike winter...
That's hilarious! Yea. It kinda feels like that!
Yep basecamp is working for me again. Thank goodness. @jusx is uber awesome, but I may be biased since I'm his wife ;-)
Enjoy your working hours ;)
Sorry! Hope you'll get it very soon. Noticed it at 9:06p.m. Wonder when it would be back :(
hey please put basecamp back. *begging*! @artvankilmer @poley are right, this is PRIME work hours for most...
Me too!! We're a paying member, too. Agah. @37signals
"silly question" in the e-newsletter: "Would you rather be skinny or rich?"
Brrrrrr! Walking the dog in subzero temps! Having a dog sounds like a lot of work.
What is koh tao?
Chocolate is our friend :D
Victoria Secret fashion show is on TV. Looks like a soft porn show. Not that I know what that would be. Really.
Heading home in the cold and snowy road. Did not bring cellphone today. Oops.
H/T @stales Pepsi's shock-value ads does not go over well with consumers. http://tinyurl.com/6c42c3 #Pepsi.
New string of SPAM emails hitting my emails, with subject line "one wife is not enough" uhhhhhhh. Alrighty then.
Lead paint on doll clothes. Recalled. Made by Manhattan Group. http://www.cpsc.gov/cpscpub/prerel/prhtml09/09059.html Made in Indonesia.
I take that back. It was precisely 30 minutes later.
Less than one hour after I signed up on twittermoms.com I got a spam comment. What the hey.
Interstate 235 was CRAWLING with cars at close to 9a.m. Bad weather in DSM.
Does anyone know of any local TV repair places for flat screens (with a chunky backside) in DSM? Not our TV. Asking for someone else.
Matters not what people say so long as you know the truth.
Denver folks: I have a strange favor to ask, please DM me if you're willing to help. Thanks!
Wondering if Santa will have the watch that I want for me, waiting under the tree perhaps. I've been nice, very nice.
45 more min until party time. Engineers-party. Do you think it'll be fun?!?!
The Internets makes the world SMALLER. Oh so much smaller. Guy who stood me up for prom added me on FB. At least 3 pals are "out"
I'm wearing fingerless gloves that goes up to my elbow. Have you seen these? They rock. I can still type and keep my hands warm!
Hot. Cold. Hot Cold. Thinking I might be getting sick...?
I'm wearing my HOLIDAY sweater. Are you???
How is it possible that it's almost 11p.m.?!?!
Anyone want a complimentary 1yr subscription to "Boating" magazine?
Interesting. An Asian family is on today's Target Portraits newsletter email.
Went to an Engineering alumni party last night. It was not very fun but I met some people and had a good chat w/ ex prof & his wife.
If you pick your nose while you're driving, people can still see it. Really, they can.
Must spend some time playing with tweetdeck and probably making a switch soon.
Come on ppl! Cld he have gotten far if he wasn't?? http://is.gd/aB11 Let's get a blk man for the case so ppl won't think it's a racial thing
That was fwded by a friend, who always likes to fwd emails to me...
One day, long ago there lived a woman who did not whine, nag or b*tch. But this was a long time ago...and it was just that one day. The end.
RT @yizmo Get UR "Twitterfriends" Mug for just $14 http://crowdedink.com/ OK this is cute. But what if someone falls off your friends list?
No new updates from @BarackObama since Nov 5th.
Lunch with a new friend rescheduled. At least I'm all dressed up and look nice. :)
kids are STILL up. 10.17 p.m.
Never enough time in the day (or night!) to finish all the work.
Didn't finish my coke yesterday. Is it still safe to drink it?
Sleep....... I want.
TIRED. Had about 4.5 hrs of sleep.
I never liked how my Chinese (maiden) name translated to Roman letters (Western), but I sure am glad that it wasn't Ho.
bling bling bling bling bling bling bling bling bling bling bling bling bling bling bling bling bling bling bling bling bling bling bling!!!
Wow. Some sites REALLY love blings.
Just unsubscribed VS.
Also? Every Other Day emails seems a bit much.
Annoyed when I receive email campaign emails that I did not ask for nor did I ever signed up for.
Sirens going off in the distance.
COLD fingers.
Zits know EXACTLY when to show up: whenever you have an event to attend or meeting someone new.
alarm clock iPod dock description "... Add some boom to your room..." HILARIOUS.
yay basecamp I've missed you.
OK. All of you saying basecamp is back up, AND hubby @jusx sitting 10 ft away from me also says it's up. But it's still down for me :(
Basecamp, come back. It's already 9:11p.m.
Feeling terrible for shouting at 3yo daughter for being in a whiney/cryey mood.
My mousepad is getting kinda icky.
RT @KangarooBoo IA, Chicagoans, & most of MN/KS/NE/MO, still time for free ground shipping, in time for XMAS! see map: http://is.gd/ckq7
subzero temps here. Do dog owners have to walk their dogs outside even in this temp? @cityslipper ?
Off to do groceries in zero F and -30F windchilll weather! BAH.
'nite everyone.
Isn't he sweet?! http://is.gd/cLO9 There's a pink version too.
